{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept FunctionCallExpression = Expression&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|FunctionCallExpression}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects a {{spar|function-call-expression}}.
